name: opencode-omniroute-auth
description: OpenCode authentication plugin for OmniRoute API with /connect command and dynamic model fetching

scripts.check:exports: node --input-type=module -e "import('./dist/index.js').then((m)=>{if(typeof m.default!=='function'){throw new Error('Default export must be a function');}for(const [key,value] of Object.entries(m)){if(typeof value!=='function'){throw new Error('Root export '+key+' must be a function to satisfy plugin loader constraints');}}})"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run check:exports
